mapper.update:
update students
sname=#{sname},
sex=#{sex},
age=#{age},
smtel=#{smtel},
education=#{education},
state=#{state},
channel=#{channel},
website=#{website},
keyWord=#{keyWord},
department=#{department},
nameConsultation=#{nameConsultation},
region=#{region},
isReport=#{isReport},
curriculum=#{curriculum},
isEffective=#{isEffective},
scoring=#{scoring},
isReturnVisit=#{isReturnVisit},
returnVisitData=#{returnVisitData},
door=#{door},
doorData=#{doorData},
reason=#{reason},
isPay=#{isPay},
payData=#{payData},
money=#{money},
isRefund=#{isRefund},
isClassEntry=#{isClassEntry},
classEntryData=#{classEntryData},
classEntryRemarks=#{classEntryRemarks},
reasonsRefund=#{reasonsRefund},
earnestMoney=#{earnestMoney},
earnestMoneyData=#{earnestMoneyData},
follow=#{follow},
qq=#{qq},
weiXin=#{weiXin},
isEnroll=#{isEnroll},
remarks=#{remarks},
consultantId=#{consultantId},
entryPersonId=#{entryPersonId},
consultantRemarks=#{consultantRemarks}
sid=#{sid}
mapper.select:
select count(Tid) from track t,Students s,Users u
t.Studentid=#{sid} and t.Studentid=s.Sid and t.UserId=u.Uid
select String0 from users where uid=1
mapper.update: update Users set Int0=#{page} where Uid=#{pageSize}
mapper.select: select uid,LoginName from Users where Uid in (select UserId from UserRoles where RoleId=3)
mapper.update: update Students set ConsultantId=#{pageSize} where Sid=#{page}
mapper.select:
select s.Sid, s.Sname, s.Sex, s.Age, s.Smtel, s.Education, s.State, s.Channel, s.Website, s.KeyWord, s.Department, s.NameConsultation, s.Region, s.IsReport, s.Curriculum, s.IsEffective, s.Scoring, s.IsReturnVisit, s.ReturnVisitData, s.Door, s.DoorData, s.Reason, s.IsPay, s.PayData, s.Money, s.IsRefund, s.IsClassEntry, s.ClassEntryData, s.ClassEntryRemarks, s.ReasonsRefund, s.EarnestMoney, s.EarnestMoneyData, s.Follow, s.QQ, s.WeiXin, s.IsEnroll, s.Remarks, s.ConsultantId, s.NetworkConsultantId, (select LoginName from Users where Uid=1) as lururen, s.ConsultantRemarks, s.Int0,u.LoginName as zixunshi,s.String0 from students s,Users u where u.Uid=s.ConsultantId and s.sid in
#{item}
